post:
Dear LET, 
Recently, we have received a lot of messages. Many people hope we can do a promotional event again at LET. We appreciate your support and therefore we have decided to organize a five-day promotional event only for Low End Talk starting next Monday.

Details of promotional event:
Date: February 8, 2021-February 12, 2021
Discount: 50 % OFF life-time
Product: Dedicated Server
-Agile S /Agile S i3 /Agile M (gamme classic) / Agile L (gamme classic) / Power M / Power L / Classic Power M 

Promotion code: We will give you coupon code on Monday, February 8 (10 A.M - PARIS Time)

[Details here](https://www.ikoula.com/en/dedicated-server?utm_source=lowendtalk&utm_medium=forum&utm_campaign=let50 "Where to buy") 

*No matter which subscription period is chosen, you can enjoy a 50% OFF lifetime discount, excluding renewal. This offer is for Agile S, Agile S i3, Agile M, Agile L, Power M, Power L, Classic Power M, valid from February 8, 2021 (09:00 UTC +1-Paris) to February 12, 2021 (23:59 UTC +1-Paris). This offer cannot be used with other discounts at the same time, each person can use a maximum of 2 coupons and only 70 coupons offered.

See you soon  :)
